sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input v-model="inputValue" type="text" />
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "MisaInput",
  props: ["value"],
  watch: {
    value() {
      this.emitValueChanged();
    },
  },
  methods: {
    emitValueChanged() {
      this.$emit("input-value-changed", this.inputValue);
    },
  },

  data() {
    return {
      inputValue:""
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
